conversationHistory.content:
Here's the updated character data for norn:

EQUIP: Chain Mail (armor), Shield (armor), Well-preserved longbow (weapon), Scroll of Protection from Undead (consumable), Gambling Dice (miscellaneous), Tarnished Military Medals (miscellaneous), Weatherproof Cloak (armor), Detailed Keep Map (secret passages) (miscellaneous), Silver Signet Ring (keep's sigil) (miscellaneous), Spectral Scribe's Lost Journal Page (miscellaneous), Spectral Scribe's Second Lost Journal Page (miscellaneous), Silver Coin (miscellaneous), Lord Vael's signet ring (miscellaneous), Jeweled dagger (weapon), Family Chronicle (miscellaneous), Sir Garran's leather journal (details his corruption, arcane circle, hidden chamber, and letter to Elara) (miscellaneous), Tarnished Key Ring with 3 Ancient Keys (miscellaneous), Sergeant Ralth's Journal (Gaol Log) (miscellaneous), Echo Crystal (miscellaneous), Prisoner List Parchment (miscellaneous), Evidence of Elen's Passage (bootprints, blue thread) (miscellaneous), Duty Roster (note about special prisoner) (miscellaneous), Crude Map to Forgotten Ossuary (secret passage) (miscellaneous), Ring of Keys (storage lockers) (miscellaneous), Potion of Heroism (consumable), Reward Coffer from Harrow's Hollow (miscellaneous), Wand of Magic Missiles (miscellaneous), Scroll of Cure Light Wounds (consumable) x2, Travel Ration (miscellaneous) x7, Vial of Lamp Oil (miscellaneous), Bedroll (miscellaneous), Waterskin (miscellaneous), Hemp Rope (50 feet) (miscellaneous), Torch (miscellaneous) x3
AMMO: Arrows x31, Ancient Arrows x0
ATK: Longsword (melee, 1d8 slashing), Crude Dagger (melee, 1d4 piercing), Sturdy Bow (ranged, 1d6 piercing), Greatclub (melee, 1d8 bludgeoning)
SPELLCASTING:  | DC: 0 | ATK: +0
SPELLS: 
CURRENCY: 0G, 0S, 0C
XP: 16581/14000
TRAITS: I'm always polite and respectful. I don't trust my gut feelings, so I tend to hesitate even when I should act quickly.
IDEALS: Responsibility. I do what I must and obey just authority.
BONDS: I fight for those who cannot fight for themselves.
FLAWS: I have a hard time hiding my true feelings. My sharp tongue often gets me into trouble.
Module summary: Extended adventure in Keep_of_Doom with multiple significant events and discoveries.
